titles.title: Authorizing the Speaker's designee to administer the oath of office to Representative-Elect Julia Carson.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 1/7/1997--Introduced. Authorizes the Speaker of the House of Representatives to administer the oath of office to Representative-elect Julia Carson at Indianapolis, Indiana.
